name: Productivity (assertchris)
description:
This is a stuffy old work application. Please don't click on any strange buttons. Nothing to see, here...

There seems to be a bit of a bug, where clicking outside the *ahem* application leads to not being able to type in it anymore. Refreshing seems to fix it. Unsure if it's because of something I've done, or a side-effect of embedding the game.

Submitted for the Brackeys 2022.1 game jam. I submitted early (MVP) and will be adding more to it until the jam closes.
